name: Attack on Titan

description: A spy family hides secrets while pursuing peace.

name: Death Note
description: A student uses a deadly notebook to reshape the world

description: An apothecary solves court mysteries with her skills.

description: A woman in a twilight hotel seeks her lost memories.

name: Bleach
